name: BDSM - Pillory LoRA
description:
Second entry in my BDSM related series of LoRAs

Works well in conjunction with my POV Doggy Anal + Creampie LoRA.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

Update: For V2 I re-trained the model with some adjustments to the dataset. The result is much better faces and more reliable results from behind.

Supports both 'from front' and 'from behind' perspectives.

'Kneeling' only works properly from behind. Some messiness with the hands is to be expected.

Recommended LoRA Strength: 0.7-0.8

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
